00062 // CFaceDetectView drawing

00064 void CFaceDetectView::OnDraw(CDC* pDC)
00065 {
00066         CFaceDetectDoc* pDoc = GetDocument();
00067         ASSERT_VALID(pDoc);
00068 
00069         int i,j;
00070         IntImage& im = pDoc->image;
00071         if(im.height>0)
00072         {
00073                 for(i=0;i<im.height;i++)
00074                         for(j=0;j<im.width;j++)
00075                                 pDC->SetPixel(j,i,RGB(im.data[i][j],im.data[i][j],im.data[i][j]));
00076         }
00077 
00078 }

00121 // CFaceDetectView message handlers
00122 
00123 void CFaceDetectView::OnViewTrainimage() 
00124 {
00125         CString s;
00126         int i,j;
00127         CFaceDetectDoc* pDoc;
00128 
00129         index++;
00130         if(index<0 || index>gTotalCount) index=0;
00131         s.Format("index=%d",index);
00132         pDoc = GetDocument();
00133         pDoc->SetTitle(s);
00134         pDoc->image=gTrainSet[index];
00135         for(i=1;i<gSx+1;i++)
00136                 for(j=1;j<gSy+1;j++)
00137                 {
00138                         pDoc->image.data[i][j]=gTrainSet[index].data[i][j]+gTrainSet[index].data[i-1][j-1]-gTrainSet[index].data[i][j-1]-gTrainSet[index].data[i-1][j];
00139                 }
00140         pDoc->UpdateAllViews(NULL);
00141 }
00142 
00143 void CFaceDetectView::OnLButtonUp(UINT /*nFlags*/, CPoint point)
00144 {
00145         CFaceDetectDoc* pDoc;
00146 
00147         pDoc = GetDocument();
00148         if(point.x<pDoc->image.width && point.y<pDoc->image.height)
00149         {
00150                 CString s;
00151                 s.Format("x=%d,y=%d,value=%d",point.x,point.y,int(pDoc->image.data[point.y][point.x]));
00152                 pDoc->SetTitle(s);
00153         }
00154 }
